Reviews.Title: “Nice big quiet hotel”
Reviews.Author: GRE95
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel. It is in a nice quiet area of the city, not many cars drive past your window and there are no clubs nearby to disturb your sleep. The staff are friendly and the reception staff speak english. I like this hotel as it's also a self contained flat with microwave and hob etc. I can't comment on the breakfast served here as usually cook myself or goto one of the many resturants in the city. The apartment is very big and has 3 bedrooms so good for big groups or just one person. They have satilite tv with about 400 channels (it took me a while channel hoping lol) but i only saw about 3 channels in english the rest turkish or arabic but you dont go on holiday to watch tv. Trams, buses and taxis are only a short walk away along with some resturants and a small shopping centre. I always enjoy my stay here and will be going back again.

Reviews.Title: “Alternative lodging in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: luv2travel16
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel because of its proximity to the airport. I was a little worried at first because the cab driver did not know where this hotel was located. When we finally arrived at the hotel, we were impressed at the size of our room...well its not just a room, it is actually an apartment with 3 bedrooms, a kitchen, 2 baths. We were able to get a good night sleep before our flight and take advantage of complimentary breakfast. I would have rated the baran 4 stars but i was disappointed at the service more like lack of service. There is usually no one at the front desk and we had to figure out on our own how to take a cab to the airport. Fortunaly there is a cab stand right down the street. This hotel is a good option for large groups because of the space and if you want to be near the airport. I would not recommend if you want to be close to Istambul's main attractions.

Reviews.Title: “confortable stay”
Reviews.Author: dgviedma
Reviews.Content: excellent place to stay with your family. Incredibly big apartments, quiet, clean and confortable. Excellent service, gentle and helpful. Perfect situation for the airport(congress area. However, too far form the centre. We stayed for a meeting in the congress area and it is perfect and close to the underground.

Reviews.Title: “Good for a stay with friends together”
Reviews.Author: GabrieleHanne
Reviews.Content: Fantastic! The flat was in very good order and the service was excellent- very friendly staff. I will definitely recommend you to stay with friends together or as a family who need a big place to stay in Istanbul. We were 3 friends , stayed in the same apartment, each of us had his own room, and shared the price. 35 euro per person. very reasonable...

Reviews.Title: “homey-absolutely recommended”
Reviews.Author: MohammedDawoud
Reviews.Content: The apartment was far more relaxing and huge than spending the same amount on a hotel room. Istanbul was very expensive in July in all the Hotels. We found this Resicence-Hotel via Booking.com. A reasonable price for a family stay. Breakfast is included ( served in a Breakfast Room) eventhough the apartments have a fully equipped kitchen. Gonna come here with my kids while turning back from the south, absolutely recommended.....

Reviews.Title: “The apartment was ok; not satisfied with the service”
Reviews.Author: Bassel_T
Reviews.Content: location near the airport. There was no internet access in the rooms; only at the reception where there are no place to set. the bedrooms without Air condition which makes it difficult to sleep during the summer; we end up sleeping on the living room which have the only Air condition in the flat. The guy serving breakfast was not friendly and rude; we set 10 min after the breakfast time (10am) because of my kids they eat slowly; they turned off the lights while we are setting and took the dishes that was on our table in front of us; as they are forcing us to leave. this was very rude and i was unsatisfied.

Reviews.Title: “huge space for reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: AlisaBarry
Reviews.Content: Thanks for being so flexible about our reservations. We absolutely loved the apartment ... I just wanted to say, top marks for bedding! I've been travelling around Turkey for almost 5 years and those were by far the best nights' sleep I've had away from home here. The rest of the flat was in very good order and the service was excellent- very friendly staff. I will definitely recommend you to friends and family who need a place to stay in Istanbul. Quite, huge, and very reasonable price compared to expensive Hotels

Reviews.Title: “Our home away from home”
Reviews.Author: dimika
Reviews.Content: Our home away from home for the past few days and we love it! It was so nice to enter this warm & inviting apartment after such a long journey. All you hard work in restoring this place has definitely paid off. We would recommend it to anyone we know who will be traveling to Istanbul! Looking forward to our next stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: lizzy8686
Reviews.Content: What an excellent addition to Istanbul's accommodation scene your apartments represent. We enjoyed our week there, and the apartment is in a great location and well appointed.

Reviews.Title: “Excelllence”
Reviews.Author: Andrei85
Reviews.Content: I was only supposed to stay here for a night, which was disappointing, because I wanted to stay longer. So far, this is the best hotel I've stayed at so far in Turkey. Because of it's prime location in the city, I expected it to be good and my wish was granted. Flats were impressively decorated. They were pretty, classy and very excellent looking. The bedroom was a pleasure to sleep in, and also had a view of the city. They were spacious and comfortable

HotelInfo.Name: Baran Residence Hotel Airport
HotelInfo.Address: Naci KasIm Cad. Neyire Neyir Sok. | No.22 Bahcelievler, Istanbul 34590, Turkey
